features.title: Code Generation
features.description: The code is automatically generated for all the languages of your project, as you update the model. Forget about missed `hashCode()` or `equals()`.

features.title: Model Extensibility
features.description: With [Protobuf support](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/proto3#updating), a model can be extended preserving backward and future compatibility with client- and server nodes of your application.

features.title: Multitenancy Support
features.description: Transforming a single-tenant application into a multi-tenant one requires a few lines of code. You don't have to introduce `tenantId` parameters for all the calls.

features.title: Open for Business Changes
features.description: Add and remove fields while keeping binary compatibility with older code; handle new opportunities with `oneof`, natively provided by Protobuf. Build new `Projections` based on the whole event history of the system.

features.title: Clear API
features.description: Concepts from the DDD books, such as [`Aggregate`]({{% get-site-data "spine.core_api_doc" %}}/server/io/spine/server/aggregate/Aggregate.html), [`Projection`]({{% get-site-data "spine.core_api_doc" %}}/server/io/spine/server/projection/Projection.html), [`ProcessManager`]({{% get-site-data "spine.core_api_doc" %}}/server/io/spine/server/procman/ProcessManager.html), [`Repository`]({{% get-site-data "spine.core_api_doc" %}}/server/io/spine/server/entity/Repository.html) are right in the code. Ever guessed how to cook a [`BoundedContext`]({{% get-site-data "spine.core_api_doc" %}}/server/io/spine/server/BoundedContext.html)? Guess no more!

features.title: Built-in Validation
features.description: Constraints defined in a business model are automatically checked for commands, events, and entity states. [Learn more](docs/guides/validation/).

features.title: Multiple Storage and Deployment Platforms
features.description: The framework promotes development of storage- and platform-agnostic code. You can start with [JDBC](https://github.com/SpineEventEngine/jdbc-storage) and later switch to Google Cloud Platform [Datastore](https://github.com/SpineEventEngine/gcloud-java) simply changing a few lines of code.

features.title: Permissive Apache License
features.description: Use freely in closed-source projects. You are also welcome to contribute to improving our framework.

features.title: Promoted Immutability
features.description: All the data types are immutable, which makes it easy to cache and share. Mutations are performed _only_ in response to incoming messages using clearly defined cycles.

features.title: Type Safety
features.description: Should you need `CustomerId` or `WorkEstimate` value, you get it within seconds, for multiple languages. You can also have binary storage format and automatic JSON support.

features.title: Develop faster, with better results
features.description: With CQRS and Event-Driven Architecture you can separate development workflows. More experienced team members can concentrate on the core domain and the write-side tasks while the readâ€“side and UI are created by the rest of the team.
